text: is a Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Chiba was born in Osaka on June 15, 1993. After graduating from Himeji Hinomoto College, she joined AS Harima Albion based in Himeji in 2014. On June 2, 2016, Chiba debuted for Japan national team against United States. She played 5 games for Japan until 2017. ==Statistics== List of match in 2016, 2017 at Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2016 3 0 2017 2 0 Total 5 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Japan Football Association Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Osaka Prefecture Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players
title: Sonoko Chiba
